title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Tezuka_Osamu_Cultural_Prize
transformers_text: Named after Osamu Tezuka , the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize ( 手塚治虫文化賞 , Tezuka Osamu Bunkashō ) is a yearly manga prize awarded to manga artists or their works that follow the Osamu Tezuka manga approach founded and sponsored by Asahi Shimbun . The prize has been awarded since 1997, in Tokyo , Japan .
